sources.title: The Accused (1949) Loretta Young, Wendell Corey, Robert Cummings
sources.description: The Accused is a 1949 American FILM NOlR drama film directed by William Dieterle and written by Ketti Frings, based on Be Still, My Love, a 1947 novel written by June Truesdell. The film stars Loretta Young, Robert Cummings and Wendell Corey.    You can find out more about this movie from Wikipedia .

metadata.Plot: Wilma Tuttle, psychology professor, lets aggressively brash student Bill Perry drive her home. Big mistake. After an attempted rape, Perry is dead; panicked, Wilma hides her traces and flees. As time passes, she watches the investigations of Homicide Lt. Dorgan with painfully concealed apprehension. Complicating matters: her budding romance with Warren Ford, Perry's guardian. How long can she stand the strain?
metadata.Writer: Ketti Frings, June Truesdell, Jonathan Latimer
metadata.Actors: Loretta Young, Robert Cummings, Wendell Corey
